titleStmt.title: Of the redemption of mankind three bookes wherein the controuersie of the vniuersalitie of redemption and grace by Christ, and of his death for all men, is largely handled. Hereunto is annexed a treatise of Gods predestination in one booke. Written in Latin by Iacob Kimedoncius D. and professor of Diuinitie at Heidelberge, and translated into English by Hugh Ince preacher of the word of God.
De redemptione generis humani. English
titleStmt.author: Kimedoncius, Jacobus, d. 1596.
Ince, Hugh, b. 1554 or 5.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kingston for Humfrey Lovvnes,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: De redemptione generis humani.
A variant of the edition lacking Humphrey Lownes' name in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
